data.comment: Gent kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Alessio Castro-Montes.
In the minute 32, Nicky Hayen (Waasland-Beveren) is making a first substitution, with Andrija Vukcevic replacing Serge Leuko.
Andreas Wiegel (Waasland-Beveren) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Waasland-Beveren kick-off.
The away team have replaced Andreas Wiegel with Jur Schryvers. This is the second substitution made today by Nicky Hayen.
Goal! Roman Yaremchuk extends Gent's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 61, Andreas Hanche-Olsen (Gent) gets a yellow card.
Michael Frey (Waasland-Beveren) has received a first yellow card.
The home team replace Andreas Hanche-Olsen with Dino Arslanagic.
In the minute 80, Nicky Hayen is making the team's third substitution at Ghelamco Arena with Jordan Faucher replacing Alexis Gamboa.
Elisha Owusu is replacing Sven Kums for Gent at Ghelamco Arena.
Tim Kleindienst is replacing Vadis Odjidja for the home team.
That's full-time at Ghelamco Arena. The final score is 3-0.
Goal! Gent extend their lead to 3-0 through Osman Bukari.
